abilities.description: Whitebeard uses his Gura Gura no Mi powers to shatter the massive ice walls created by the Marines, demonstrating the destructive power of the fruit.

keyMoments.title: Destroying the Ice Walls
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard demonstrates the devastating power of the Gura Gura no Mi by shattering the Marine's encircling ice walls.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the tactical use of the fruit's power and proves Whitebeard's strength even after being stabbed.
